website_summaries.verdict: Amazing touchless 2-compartment trash can for garbage and recycling.
pros: Each container holds vast amounts of trash and recyclables
Hands-free: opens and closes when it detects nearby motion
Unlike other automatic cans, batteries last 5 to 6 months with normal use
cons: Some complaints that the lid stops working occasionally
Problem can be fixed by taking out batteries and replacing them 24 hours later

customer_reviews.title: Dies in 6 Months
customer_reviews.text: I thought I loved this trash bin. It's attractive, doesn't get dirty and opens automatically. However, I should have read some of the reviews before I bought it. The top lasts about 6 months and then it stops opening and closing. I did everything to get it to work. It's dead. If you want something to work for 6 months, by all means, buy it - but if you're expecting a long-lasting item, don't do it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Shertenlieb

customer_reviews.title: Nothing will fix this piece of garbage trash can
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this zero stars. This trash can from the first week purchased has not worked correctly. It will open the immediately shut or simply not open at all. It will also open and close at completely random intervals draining what little battery life it keeps. Nothing will fix this piece of garbage trash can. What is funny is that this item meant to house trash will soon become trash itself. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: michelle mclaskey

customer_reviews.title: I really loved it until it started opening and shutting on its ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few months ago and started using it recently. I really loved it until it started opening and shutting on its own several times through the night it will do this and it wakes me up. I don't know if it has a short or not? Someone else have this problem??
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Sharp

customer_reviews.title: wasted almost as much in 4D Batteries per can than ...
customer_reviews.text: Listen to the reviews. I bought 2 of these. They're ok except the lid stops working. wasted almost as much in 4D Batteries per can than I paid for both of them. Not sure why the motor that runs the auto lid just stops working - I thought it was the batteries but after replacing them twice they are both dead - not just one but both! I'll be spending the money to get a decent replacement with a foot pedal. By the way they died after about 6 months and I've had them both for less than a year. I have not reached out to the manufacturer but it sounds like they won't do much.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan W.

customer_reviews.title: I owned this CAN for just less than a year ...
customer_reviews.text: I owned this CAN for just less than a year before the automatic feature died. I changed the batteries, tried everything short of taking it apart. Seller/manufacturer were no help. I now have an overpriced trash can that does what practically every other trash can on earth does... I open it by hand and put my trash in. This is a complete piece of junk. Update: 30 NOV 18, still own this trash can, still opening by hand, still angry I paid $100 at time of purchase for what I could’ve bought in Rubbermaid containers for $20, still zero from the manufacturer. Save your money! This is, indeed, a “trash” container.
customer_reviews.author: P.W.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped functioning within 4 months!
customer_reviews.text: Bought on August 15, 2017. Electronic lid stopped functioning correctly — basically lifting up when motion sensor was activated— in December 2017. Replacing the batteries did not help. Last electronic trash can lasted three years. Amazon’s warranty only lasts 30 days we customer service.
customer_reviews.author: mtexas

customer_reviews.title: Which can be a hassle when you have both hands with garbage. And the lift nossle thing to open it
customer_reviews.text: Kills batteries FAST and when the batteries are dead you have to open it by hand. Which can be a hassle when you have both hands with garbage. And the lift nossle thing to open it, there's no grip to it so if your hands are wet trying to open it, you're doomed.
customer_reviews.author: Marco R.

customer_reviews.title: I am giving three stars because after 2 months the ...
customer_reviews.text: I am giving 1 star because after 2 months the sensoe stopped working consistently. Very disappointing. Also the two compartments are way too small for a kitchen trash can so I use both sides for trash inside of recyclables. If I could still return it, I would.
customer_reviews.author: Shoplikeagirl

customer_reviews.title: Prepare yourself for a wasted headache.
customer_reviews.text: At first this was cool and new, but overtime, you get a sense for the true value in things, and this thing isn't valuable to your life, the trash gets stuck in this, and 100% rips as you pull it out. Everything is too tight. Your better off building your own trash from used wood at home Depot. Cause you will truly be annoyed by this trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Bestin Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Add me to the list...dead in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: The problems started with it struggling to open and now it will open but not close. I took it apart (there are lots of screws to remove) and nothing was broken inside, so I can only assume that either a sensor is now faulty or the motor is failing. Like other reviews of this product have correctly stated: you get what you pay for...so caveat emptor my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Sys_Admin

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I am somewhat disappointed in this can system. We had to drill two holes in the back in order to break the suction to remove full bags without lifting/wrestling the whole can. This required a special drill accessory to make large enough holes in the stainless. Like other reviewers, my unit came a little dinged (we banged them flush so they aren’t really visible). Even after months of use, the sensor still works, but is slightly slower than other cans on the market (lid opens after short delay). It gets the job done, but if I had it to do over again, I would spend more money and get a higher quality unit.
customer_reviews.author: Wifey

customer_reviews.title: VERY VERY disappointed in Amazon on this
customer_reviews.text: I wish there were negative Stars. Just open the box and this was obviously used, returned, repackaged and sent back out. Not only that but the sensor is total junk it does not open when you wave your hand over it and the open and close buttons do not work all that officially either. VERY VERY disappointed in Amazon on this one
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: The trash can has been great for nearly 2 years regarding the function of the ...
customer_reviews.text: The trash can has been great for nearly 2 years regarding the function of the lid. The motor just recently stopped working so it is now only working manually. Unfortunately the trash can lid also does not seal well onto the trash can very well with standard size trash bags.
customer_reviews.author: C Santos

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent motor system. Would be 5 star idea if worked!
customer_reviews.text: Mad item with a mind of its own. Followed instructions and video. Refused to open and close with a 'wave'. Needs a lot of batteries for something eco-friendly. Gave up entirely and just lift open the lid. Then suddenly from nowhere, weeks later started opening and closing at random and now appears to be working. Not worth sending back and fits the space I needed. Just hoping it continues to cooperate.
customer_reviews.author: aNon

customer_reviews.title: 1 year and done
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this a solid 5 star review up until last week.... when this trash can stopped working properly. Actually, it stopped working completely. I’ve done all the trouble shooting my research has recommended and the automatic lid simply doesn’t work anymore. I’ve read other reviews stating that the warranty process to replace/ repair the lid costs $20, which is absurd. I’ll just take my business elsewhere and put the $20 there.
customer_reviews.author: J. Shadows

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a few months...then stops
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for about a year. Then it got to where it wouldn't open. I thought it needed new batteries, but that was not it. It simply will not open or close on its own. Tried taking it apart, but still could not get it to work. A friend ordered one after seeing mine and her's quit working before mine did. So I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Donell B Eichler

customer_reviews.title: Not a long-term investment
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept. So much so that I have purchased two of these in the past three years. Why two? Because the opening mechanism fails after about a year of use. As much as I would love to get another one, it's time to move on to a different design and manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: M. McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Beware! Although the size is okay and it’s nice to have 2 separate slots for recycle and trash in one can, the motion sensor stopped working after 16 days. They should rename the company OneStar.
customer_reviews.author: T. K. P.

customer_reviews.title: it's supposed to be convenient to put the band on the garbage bag and keep the bag hidden
customer_reviews.text: I regret purchasing this trash can. It only opens half of the time, and I have to constantly turn it on and off to get it to function properly. Also, it's supposed to be convenient to put the band on the garbage bag and keep the bag hidden, but it makes no sense. If it's not showing, it's slipping into the can. So long story short, highly unrecommended. Low quality, bad design, and mechanical errors.
customer_reviews.author: Lafeher

customer_reviews.title: Love it when working but will not buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in April, it died in August... Piece of junk. replacement part almost as expensive as original price. DO NOT BUY. This is the second one we have had. Love it when working but will not buy another
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Broken Sensor less than a year in to using.
customer_reviews.text: After less than a year using this trash bin, the sensor no longer works. this sensor broke about 8 month into using it and we tried simply opening it with our hands every time but the lack of proper handle makes it difficult. This would not be an issue if it was easier to open without the auto open feature. Overall I have to give it a 1 because it is not made to last.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Thornhill

customer_reviews.title: Motion sensor doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed that the lid doesn’t work. The size of recycle and garbage parts are bigger than expecte, I which is nice but the motion sensor doesn’t work. I got new batteries from the store just to make sure and sadly the batteries were not the problem. Defective :(
customer_reviews.author: Joe Wegner

customer_reviews.title: The bin that likes to stay open...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bin about 4 months ago. Worked fine for 3 months. Then, out of no where, the lid just stays open. If we close it, it pops right back open. Tried turning the unit off and on but there is no change in behavior. We have now turned the power off and are using it manually. But this is very inconvenient because the lid wasn't designed to be operated manually on a regular basis. Disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Laiq

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Like many others with similar problem. My order arrived with multiple dents!
customer_reviews.author: Ramesh Rampersad

customer_reviews.title: Was disappointed there was no option for a plug so I ...
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed there was no option for a plug so I returned it. Batteries are too expensive and this would run through them constantly​.
customer_reviews.author: Donna B.

customer_reviews.title: I was happy with this item until it suddenly stopped working last ...
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with this item until it suddenly stopped working last week, despite new batteries. The motor makes a sound but does not lift the lid. Please advise how this can be resolved. I’d appreciate replacement of the top piece. Thank you for a prompt reply.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley J. Munn

customer_reviews.title: Great for the first 6 months
customer_reviews.text: This trash can was amazing the first 6 months, but after that the sensor started to malfunction. We changed the batteries, but a month later it started happening again and battery changes did not help. So now it’s just a basic trash can, except we have to open the lid with our hands, now. We are going to look for a replacement from a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: The plastic lid liner is flimsy so it doesn't hold the bags good. I hate I ordered this trash can
customer_reviews.text: Even with new batteries, the lid opens when it wants to. The inside containers don't come out, so it's a hassle taking the bags out. The plastic lid liner is flimsy so it doesn't hold the bags good. I hate I ordered this trash can. I used it about two weeks and it's been in the box ever since. I put it to the side to return it, and began using my old Walmart trash can again. I forgot to return it, and now I'm stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Lid worked for 4 months, then stopped opening automatically. New batteries did not help the situation.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Terry

customer_reviews.title: love the garbage can
customer_reviews.text: love the garbage can, but was delivered with a huge dent on the side. was pretty upset considering how much i spent. dent is still there but re-packaging and sending back is always such a huge hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Emily LaMarie

customer_reviews.title: Does not last.
customer_reviews.text: Thhis garbage can worked like a dream for about 5 days. Then it started making a clicking noise every time it opened. We are now about two months from our purchase date and it has stopped working enitely. Very dissappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Richard G. Watza

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine for 4 months then started opening and closing on ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought in December. Worked fine for 4 months then started opening and closing on its own and now doesn't work at all. Replaced batteries twice. First time batteries lasted 4 months and now batteries are fine but the machinery is dead. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Viqas

customer_reviews.title: Stops working promptly - very poor product
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the cost, it stopped working in 13 months
customer_reviews.author: Cuffy1

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Tried two battery sets but tops won’t auto open nor do the touch to open/close buttons work. Wanted to exchange for new top told no returns even though I just wanted to switch for a functional top.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Caras

customer_reviews.title: The product is good, but like this it is
customer_reviews.text: We tried to take out the stickers for an hour, there is no chance to do so. Real nightmare! The product is good, but like this it is useless
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Received this today and placed the batteries in. When ...
customer_reviews.text: Received this today and placed the batteries in. When I switched it on the light remained a solid read and it would neither close or open. I did all of the troubleshooting offered in the manual and still nothing. Will be returning or figuring something else out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The open close button on top is peeling off but ...
customer_reviews.text: The open close button on top is peeling off but it's okay quality. Would've gone with something bigger. It's really small.
customer_reviews.author: consumed

customer_reviews.title: Poor design, nice idea
customer_reviews.text: I loved this until the middle plastic bar broke after it was just out of warranty. I called the company, and they can't provide the part or help in any way. Now it's a very expensive single bin.
customer_reviews.author: utstrucken

customer_reviews.title: ... shot even though I saw the complaints because I liked the size of the compartments
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a shot even though I saw the complaints because I liked the size of the compartments. It wouldn't close all the way so we weighted the lid, but then it stopped opening. We fiddled with it and couldn't get it to work so we removed the motor and now have an extremely expensive trashcan that doesn't even have step-to-open. I'm not even going to try to get a refund because I saw peoples' experiences with the shoddy customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 'Trash' can is an appropriate name for this product
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this trash can at the beginning of June and it stopped working a week or so later and then after a couple of days, it began working again. Now, two weeks out of the return period it has stopped working again. Even when it was working it was difficult to get it to open, having to wave your hand very close repeatedly. We tried different batteries to make sure there was not a battery issue- no go.
customer_reviews.author: JFQ

customer_reviews.title: Works Exactly How It’s Suppose To!! My Favvv!
customer_reviews.text: Best Trashcan Everrrr! Sleek, Modernn, Chic... Cute. Perfect Addition are My Kitchen. I love my little helper trashcan! Opens with a hand motion & Automatically Closes. Super Happy Woth This Purchase and I’ve had it for month’s! Works Exactly How It’s Suppose To!! My Favvv!
customer_reviews.author: Korena

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for large families
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price. We took out the divider because we accumulate a lot of trash and it became a hassle changing both sides everyday. Now it’s one big, deep bin and I love it. It can be a bit flimsy on the front of the can without the divider. Otherwise it’s perfect. Sensory works great and packaging was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lid stops opening/closing fully
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for the first half a year! The lid stopped opening all of the way or closing back down all of way, and even so it moved much slower than when I initially got it. I thought the batteries were going dead so I replaced them but it made no improvement. Now I see that many others have had this same issue. Not the quality I expected for the $80 pricetag.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie C.

customer_reviews.title: It is great for the 2 of us!
customer_reviews.text: We love this item. Yes it is smaller than others but there is just the 2 of us so works great. Only down side is one of the sides has holes in the bottom of it which I did not notice until the first time I went to wash it out so be careful of that. I do put trash bag liners in both sides as want to keep it clean. I need to see if I and get a replacement ring for one side now but for small family like ours or if you don’t mind taking the trash out this is a great deal especially if you are strong on recycling as we are.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy King

customer_reviews.title: No longer works after less than a month!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this trash can for less than a month and it no longer works. We have replaced the batteries and it still does not work. It’s great when it works but that’s just it, it doesn’t.
customer_reviews.author: James Waddell

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Need to replace the top of trash can the sensor are not working any more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I want a replacement.
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working very soon after we got it. The door thing that moves up and down sucks and doesn’t work well plus it kills batteries like crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete
customer_reviews.text: Its incomplete!! I cant turn it on because i cant put the batteries on. Its missing the cover for the batteries
customer_reviews.author: sdumani

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect it to last more than a year
customer_reviews.text: The open/close mechanism worked very well for about year. Then it worked okay for about six months. And now it doesn't work at all...
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2 months then trash!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item mid June 2017 and it stopped working yesterday 8/21/17. I have replaced batteries and the sensor still doesn't work anymore. Pretty bummed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked well up until about 2 days ago. Now the lid does not open properly, and I have to keep resetting it. I have not even had this product for a year. Should have stuck with my first inclination and gotten the one you open with pedals.
customer_reviews.author: M0rw3n

customer_reviews.title: Attractive
customer_reviews.text: I loved not having to open a lit with sticky fingers. Its also nice not having an open trashcan sitting in your kitchen. I love the fact that it is two cans in one, trash and recycle. The only thing I can think of as not liking it is when the trash is full, it is a little hard to pull the trash bag out of the container. I guess just don't stuff it so full. The trashcan over all is what I'd say is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Marv

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is a GREAT addition to any kitchen. The labeling is also great for guests because I can't stand it when they still put things in the wrong compartment after telling them. This is always a friendly reminder. The lid operation is also great on batter use. After 6 months of use, we are STILL on our first round of batteries. We have owned other motion sensor trash cans in the past that have eaten through batteries like crazy. We initially thought that we would need constant power to this, but I would recommend against that and just use batteries. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Bad decision to buy a lame product
customer_reviews.text: Automatic lid opener stopped working after 6 months even with new batteries and cleaning all the sensors as per the productinstrutctions
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Kirchner

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after only a few months
customer_reviews.text: Controls were not as responsive as hoped, started to become harder to remote control "wave" and then promptly died. Very expensive for a "garbage" garbage can.
customer_reviews.author: Walter J Scheiderich

customer_reviews.title: Super bummed out
customer_reviews.text: After one month month the trash can no longer opens with the sensor... which was the whole draw to this product. For the price, it’s a piece of junk. Super bummed out.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M. Dollar

customer_reviews.title: Faulty lid after less than a year
customer_reviews.text: Motion sensor stopped working after 9 months. Not sure who to contact for replacement. Size is great. Love the construction of the can, without the working lid, it’s hard to give a good review
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product and its warranty is terrible. We had it for about 2 weeks before ...
customer_reviews.text: This product and its warranty is terrible. We had it for about 2 weeks before it stopped working. I replaced the battery several times and it still didn't work so I contacted the company who told me to take the batteries out for 24 hours and clean the sensor and it should work after that. Well it didn't work. And now the company wants me to pay to return the lid so that they can send me a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Noman

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only 3 months.....
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this trash can until the kid stopped working properly. I got about 3 solid months out of this thing and then the lid stopped wanting to open, even after replacing the batteries. Let's just say I wouldn't advise buying this trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, electronic sensor is convenient
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for one garbage that could hold both recycling and trash. This was the perfect find for me. What I love: two sided compartment; labels to note which side is trash vs recycling; the tray that keeps the bags in place; overall size What could be better: the sensor to open the garbage can be finicky. Sometimes I wave my hand over it and it doesn't open, other times I walk by and it opens. Each side comfortably fits 30 gallon size bags.
customer_reviews.author: Diana F.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work! Terrible product!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this! The price was decent so I gave it a chance. I have never bought anything from Amazon that was not returnable. When I tried to start the return process it notified my that it could not be returned. It's an "Amazon's Choice" product. I went back to the listing and found the non returnable statement buried deep down on the page. It doesn't work properly and I don't know what to do with it. It's useless and I don't want to replace the part. Trash cans should be an easy purchase WTH! Now I'm out $90 and what do I do with this thing? Send it to the landfill? So stupid and frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: santa heinemann

customer_reviews.title: Lid Stopped Working After 1 Year
customer_reviews.text: The lid stopped working after about 1 year. It is hard to open the lid manually, because there is only a little tab to grab onto on the top of the lid. I would not recommend this garbage can.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Amazon recommended to call the manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: I did write a very positive review some time ago on this trash can, unfortunately, after I wrote it and after two years of having this trash can at home, it failed. The lid stayed opened and it would not close, even after changing batteries. Amazon recommended to call the manufacturer, who gave me "reset" instructions that did not work. The manufacturer did not a return, because I purchased this 2 years ago. Amazon did not refund or accept a return either. Very disappointed. It is unfortunate, it is a nice trash can....if you don't expect it to last more than 2 years
customer_reviews.author: Judy Betancur

customer_reviews.title: Shop wisely
customer_reviews.text: Motion. Detector quit working after the return time on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Browney

customer_reviews.title: Big Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I bought an earlier version of this NineStars touchless trash can in 2012 and it worked great until it wore out in early 2018. Based on my satisfaction with the previous one, I ordered this one as a replacement. The motion sensor feature worked OK for about two months before it started failing. About six months in and the motion sensor feature is completely useless. I regret being loyal to this brand and am very disappointed in this trash can. I love touchless trash cans so will begin searching for another brand now.
customer_reviews.author: Cuthbert G.

customer_reviews.title: The motor just runs like it is off track
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this on may 18th 2017. It never opened all the way, now it won't open period. The motor just runs like it is off track. Went to start a return process and now it is past time. Less than 3 months. Sucks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Un satisfied with Amazon/ NINESTARS help in warranty repair.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product a lot until it quit working. I spoke with Amazon twice and they won't help because I have had it 10 months. I contacted the company on their website and have not received and answer. I tried calling them and all I get are messages or voice mail. It seems the gears in the motor have broken. All I hear is the motor turning but no movement in the unit. Other customers have left the same or similar comments about it. Has a 2 yr unconditional warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Adinolfi

customer_reviews.title: Crash, Bang, Boom!
customer_reviews.text: When I moved to a new house I didn't have a cupboard big enough to put two trash cans in, so I needed something attractive enough to blend in with the kitchen with a separate compartment for recycling. The batteries died the first week, but I was okay with using it manually. The problem is that even with the batteries out the lid is very heavy and very unstable. Every time a guest comes to my house and throws something away the lid ends up crashing to the floor, first scaring and then embarrassing them! This is just not people friendly.
customer_reviews.author: cinnamon girl

customer_reviews.title: This was our second one. First one lasted a ...
customer_reviews.text: This was our second one. First one lasted a year. Second one lasted two months. They need to make them more durable.
customer_reviews.author: MEH

customer_reviews.title: Great for our new home
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something that wasn't the normal plastic and saved room for both recycles and trash. Came across this and after going through so many reviews said F it and got it. I love the size of it. I still use my trash bags I normally get, I had read that was an issue and getting the ones that are made for it are better but i don't have any issues. The stickers come with it so I wasn't trying to peel them off but I have them if I do want to put them on. So far so good and have had it for about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Julianna

customer_reviews.title: Great Trash can for price
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical because I read the reviews and the sensor not working or going through batteries quickly. I have had neither issue. The sensor works great and it's been 5 months on the same batteries. The only reason I have it 4 stars is because there is not a can on each side. It just has a plastic ring you hang the trash bag on. I wasn't prepared for that, but it's OK so far.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda C. Savoy

customer_reviews.title: Sensor is not working everytime
customer_reviews.text: It did not have any dent when I got it. And they update the stickers which are nice! ! However the sensor is not working every time. I am struggling sometimes by holding the trash and wave above the trash can. Also if you are 6 feet’s tall. I will say try to find some thing taller or you have to bend yourself to trigger the trash can sensor everytime. Anyway, it is not bad trash can but just not for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Chen

customer_reviews.title: Works great except the sticker for the open and close buttons ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great except the sticker for the open and close buttons started to peel and now the lid work errticly. The capacity of the cans are way more than we thought was a happy surprise. The lid has since stopped working all together wrote the company no response. I would not buy this item worjed for 4 moths and now it has failed
customer_reviews.author: Rosson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work half the time
customer_reviews.text: This thing is one of the worst trashcans I have purchased. I ordered it because it has recycle and trash but the automatic open doesn't work. It is hard to use and hard to open with trash in your hands when it decided to lose power. The bins inside are a weird shape so it doesn't hold that much recycle material either and when you do go to open the top manually be careful that you don't knock off the lid to the trashcan because it is back heavy and will go crashing to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Already not working
customer_reviews.text: Brought it three weeks ago.....one of those weeks I wasn't even home. Came home and the motion sensing isn't working at all. The manual open button works fine, the manual close button doesn't close the lid. The light comes on and it attempts to close but stops after moving about a quarter inch. Tried replacing the batteries....no difference. Update: It just magically started working again. Not sure what happened or if it just needed consistent use. Updated it from 1 to 3 stars, until it craps out again.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: No need to touch it!  Unless you want to
customer_reviews.text: This is the funnest... yeah weird but true..... appliance in our kitchen. It will take some getting used to folding the edges of the bag inside but it isn't a big deal! Now instead of having a garbage can and a box or bag for recyclables, this is all in one! LOVE IT SOOOOO MUCH!!!! If you are doing something over the garbage and you need it open longer, use the "OPEN" button. Otherwise, passing your hand over it, it opens then closes automatically. So cool!
customer_reviews.author: cbear

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It aready doesnt work only had it for a month
customer_reviews.author: kimp

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Touch-less! Two trashcans in one!
customer_reviews.text: I had this trashcan for 3 years before it crapped out. I don't think that's bad, because we did actually leave it out in the rain for 24 hours a year go and it still worked. We use it constantly, It's really great to have recycling on one side and trash on the other all in one compact trashcan. The touchless motion sensor is awesome! It's also incredibly sensitive, so it often opens when we walk by or lean on the counter. I love it. I'm buying another one right now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaholic

customer_reviews.title: Works well, looks good
customer_reviews.text: Since I've only had the bin for 24 hours I can only give a very basic review, but so far I'm much more satisfied with this bin than a smaller bin from a competitor that was 4 times the price and not a touchless one to boot. This bin is easy to load with trash bags, it's got a larger capacity, appears to be easy to clean. It's also nice looking and fits well in my tiny kitchen. The feature I really appreciate is the on/off switch. I won't have to worry about my younger and very nosy cat getting into it when I'm not around, as well as saving the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This was great until the motor stopped working 5 months after purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 whole months.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this two months ago and the mechanism has failed. We replaced batteries with no change. We recycled the packaging before marking down the UPC code, which is required to fill out a warranty card. No impressed. Annoyed. And irritated.
customer_reviews.author: H.A.

customer_reviews.title: Spacious & able to hold a few gallons & juice cartons.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new bin. If you're looking for a dual kitchen bin, especially if you have a big family, this is for you. Trust me you will not regret it. I bought mine off Amazon & I'm kicking myself because I would have saved tonnes of money had I bought this one sooner. I wasted money on several different motion sensor bins before buying this. Besides, it looks cute in my kitchen get compliments all the time. Love love love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sensor sucks
customer_reviews.text: Owned product for a couple months and like mentioned by many other users, motion detection just stoppec working out of nowhere. Open and close still works. Sensor has never gotten wet. Tried all the troubleshooting I can. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Yu

customer_reviews.title: Trash can arrived with two dents
customer_reviews.text: The trash can arrived with two large dents. One I was able to push out slightly (still a slight dent showing) and another dent is unable to be pushed out.
customer_reviews.author: kklipp

customer_reviews.title: It was nice while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Bought it about 6 years ago and the lid has stopped opening (like so many others on here) for about a year now.
customer_reviews.author: Farid Khan

customer_reviews.title: Love this trash + recycle can! Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered and first one I received had a crazy lid that just went up and down 24 7 and didn’t work right at all. I was bummed but because of good reviews I returned it and got a new one. This one is awesome! Works perfect and easy, love how the trash bags go in, super clean and nice. And I’m so excited they started putting the stickers on the side! It looks so much nicer without them! I just do Right for Recycle. Had it 2 months and love it! Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Britt Yoga

customer_reviews.title: Too top heavy, buyer beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is BAD design! The lid keeps falling off because it's too top heavy. Whenever the lid opens it pops off the trash can. If the trash can is not completely up against a wall the lid falls off completely! Wish this problem surfaced when I first bought this trash can; now I'm stuck with a defective, frusterating trash can!
customer_reviews.author: Toni O. George

customer_reviews.title: which was very disappointing because it's a great idea.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the lid stopped working within 6 months, which was very disappointing because it's a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: APM

customer_reviews.title: Bought this twice!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this automatic trash/recycle can about 6 years ago! It’s been so wonderful, love the touch less feature. Also, it’s a good size and holds a lot. It finally stopped working recently and wouldn’t work no matter how many new batteries we tried. We missed the convenience and germ free / touch less feature on a daily basis. I was so happy to find that it’s still available on Amazon and ordered it right away. I find this product hard to live without! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KJS, RI

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy this can, but I find that when I am cooking and move to the trash can to drop trash in, sometimes it’s a pain to get the rfid to pick up my movement. Not sure if it’s the setting on the motion detector or if it’s me but it kind of defeats the purpose of me buying it. Easy to clean, sure. Sturdy, definitely, but the motion detection is leaving a lot be desired on this one.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth

customer_reviews.title: ... I returned it and thought maybe I got a bad one so I reordered it
customer_reviews.text: Bought the first time and the open close sensor stopped working after 2 weeks so I returned it and thought maybe I got a bad one so I reordered it. Sure enough, the second has broken already, this time the gear somehow won't open the trash can lid all the way. Super annoying :(
customer_reviews.author: Steph Par

customer_reviews.title: Good item needs work
customer_reviews.text: I recieved this item. After opening the box it looked like the picture. For the price I paid, I was expecting a product with more durability. After placing the batteries in the item it worked for one day and stopped. I got frustrated because previous videos warned of this. Then I remembered I had issues with inserting the batteries, so I adjusted the batteries in the housing and it started working. My suggestion to the company is to make a more durable product for the price,or lower the price; correct the battery housing issue. This is a good product just not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved until it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I loved this trash can/recycle combo until now. It worked great, have only had to change the batteries once in 5 months and I really appreciate the sensor-open when my hands are full. But now, it won’t work. The green light flashes but the sensor doesn’t sense. Have changed the batteries, flipped the switch on and off...super disappointed. And the handle isn’t large enough to comfortably open manually. Would love a free replacement 😕
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Was great... until Stopped working in a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: I love this bin, aside from its very narrow and hard to get the trash out. And One star- because the lid already stopped working!! I’ve only had it a month - it worked great the first few weeks with high motion detection - used brand new batteries- and all the sudden lid won’t open and close. After replacing batteries it will open if I push the button but not like it used to ... really sucks my return window closed
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: Poor performance and customer support
customer_reviews.text: We had this product for about 6 months . The sensor stopped working. No abuse or misuse. It just stopped working. Called customer service: after trying to do a reset which consists of taking out the batteries for 24 hr...go figure....it still was not working. Then, after paying shipping to have the lid sent in for repairs I get a call at least a week later that says they examined it and it's working fine. But it's not ! So I guess they are sending it back and shrugging their shoulders. $70 + dollars later I should've just bought a Walmart plastic bucket!
customer_reviews.author: Hoover

customer_reviews.title: I did my homework on duel automatic garbage cans...this one's a winner!
customer_reviews.text: My needs for a garbage can... 1) duel purpose (garbage and recycling) 2) stainless steel 3) automatic open 4) asteticaly pleasing 4) Under $125 This garbage can met all my needs, and it had decent reviews. I have a five person household, so I'm excited to see how it holds up. I'll update my post on one week with results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best auto sensor garbage can for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great garbage can, it will even stay open if you need it too. Once you open the lid and it tries to close just push it back to stay open. My only issue was that the plastic separater inside bent from pushing too much garbage in the can on one side. The other slight issue was the label not staying stuck. Make sure you clean the surface before adhering the recycle / trash labels. I just used glue to keep it down.
customer_reviews.author: Mo B

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect and good looking
customer_reviews.text: I did take the two small screws out of the divider as we have a single stream recycling system in place. The auto open top is the best! I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Having trouble with automatic lid
customer_reviews.text: The box says it comes with a pair of D batteries, but as far as I can tell it does not. It is a very nice trash/recycling can. Very sturdy and easy to use. Very easy to keep clean. I like the stickers to tell which side is which. I have to give it only 4 stars simply because I don't have the D batteries to be able to report if the automatic lid feature works. Otherwise good product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Motion Sensor doesn't work reliably
customer_reviews.text: The motion sensor as temperamental and wouldn't work reliably. At first we thought it was the batteries, so we bought new ones and it still didn't work, tried the batteries in other things and they worked fine. I decided if this was how it was working when it was brand new, then I didn't want to see how bad it would get after the test of time and I returned it. We only had for 4-5 days.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Van Noy

product_meta.title: NINESTARS Automatic Touchless Infrared Motion Sensor Trash Can/Recycler with D Shape Silver/Black Lid & Stainless Base, 18 Gal, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description:
Size:18 Gal| Design:Trash CanThis 18 Gal. Recycling stainless steel is designed and engineered by Nine Stars the World's first legal patent holder. First innovative touchless design for recycling purpose, it can use it in any kitchen, office pantry room, cafeteria, restaurant and other recycling area. This recycle trashcan uses the most advance sensor technology can be found in all Nine Stars trashcans. As your hand or debris within ten inches and 130° angle from the infrared sensor, the lid will automatically opens. The lid will remain open if debris or hand remains within the range of the infrared sensor. Three seconds after your hand moves away from the lid, it closes automatically. Power lasts up to 6 months in normal daily usage. Required three D-size batteries (not included). Includes a garbage bag ring to keeps the bag hidden from public view for a neat and clean appearance.

NOTE:
1. Please make sure the battery has the correct direction of positive and negative insert.
2. Please make sure after the battery input, the power button is turned on which is located on the side of the lid.
3. Please make sure the lid is securely pushed down the base of the trashcan.
feature_bullets: Hassle Free Two-Year Warranty - Hassle free warranty process with our dedicated customer service line and at no additional charges for your defective parts

High Quality Materials - Water-resistant infrared motion sensor prevents moisture or any accidental spills from damaging the unit. Plust finger-print resistant stainless steel base helps keep the can clean.
Advanced Technology - Delay sensing technology preserves battery life and prevents any unnecessary opening from pets, children, or walking by. Quiet closing function for longivity of product life.
Touch-free Motion Sensor Lid Clouser - Seal odor in and eliminate cross-contamination of germs. Requires 4 "D" batteries (not included), Alkaline battery highly recommended for best performance.

Ease and Convenient - Removable ring liner holds trash bag sturdy in place and prevents bag from overhanging for a neat and clean appearance. Use any standard trash bags or NINESTARS custom trash bags NSTB-10-30.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars4,242 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
